Recruit people, Develop them & Retain them

I had the privilege of working with Dafra at Starwood Hotels and Resorts Worldwide. Dafra is a highly organized, goal oriented, independent and hard working perfectionist always ready to put all his energy and stamina to get the job done. Well educated, energetic and is able to work in a fast-paced environment. Dafra is a dedicated, ambitious and result driven professional. If you ever need someone to deliver under pressure, no slip-ups, just results, Dafra is your man. Dafra is ready to deal with difficult situations and solve the problems on time. Dafra is probably one of the smartest Human Resources professionals I have ever worked with.

summary: Over 18 years of leadership experience in human resources and operations functions with proven success in (1) Establishing and maintaining meaningful internal and external client relationships and partnerships. (2) Employee relations, talent acquisition and retention, leadership development and training. (3) Developing and executing strategic goals and objectives designed to empower teams to continually improve overall effectiveness and efficiency, client experience and satisfaction, and exceed performance metrics
name: Tom Odegaarden
title: Director of Human Resources at ZipRecruiter
